steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9c126","text":"To purify GST-TEX264, fuse the cytosol-exposed domain of TEX264 (28-313aa) to a N-terminal synthesize gene GST-tag by Genscript and clone into a pGEX-4T1 vector. Plasmid also available from Addgene. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40sib","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ce9qf","text":"Collect the supernatant and incubate with pre-equilibrated Glutathione Sepharose 4B beads (GE Healthcare) for   at   with gentle shaking to bind GST-TEX264.
